Package com.jidesoft.status

The package contains the classes related to StatusBar component for JIDE Components product.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ProgressStatusBarItem.CancelCallback A callback for the progress fields cancel button.
 

Class Summary
ButtonStatusBarItem A status bar item with a button.
ComboBoxStatusBarItem A status bar item with a JComboBox.
EmptyStatusBarItem An empty StatusBarItem.
LabelStatusBarItem A status bar item with a JLabel.
MemoryStatusBarItem MemoryStatusBarItem is used to display current used memory vs total memory in current JVM.
OvrInsStatusBarItem A status bar item that can be used to indicate the keyboard insert/overwrite status.
ProgressStatusBarItem ProgressStatusBarItem is the main one that can display the status.
ResizeStatusBarItem A status bar item which can be used as resizable corner.
StatusBar A custom status bar component.
StatusBarItem Status bar item is the basic element for StatusBar.
StatusBarSeparator StatusBarSeparator provides a divider between status bar items.
TimeStatusBarItem TimeStatusBarItem is used to display a clock or calendar on the status bar.
 

Package com.jidesoft.status Description

The package contains the classes related to StatusBar component for JIDE Components product.
